item.title: 巴西财政方案将包括提高股票利息税
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，政府的新财政方案包括将所谓的股权利息（JCP）所得税税率从 15%提高到 20%。【原文：Brazil's Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday that the government's new fiscal package includes an increase in the income tax rate levied on so-called interest on equity (JCP) payments to 20% from 15%.】

item.title: 穆迪指出散户投资者涉足私人信贷的风险
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二警告说，将资金投入私人市场的散户投资者的快速增长可能会带来流动性和资产质量风险，这凸显了私人信贷领域的潜在脆弱性。【原文：The rapid growth in retail investors, who put their money into private markets, could create liquidity and asset quality risks, Moody's Ratings warned on Tuesday, highlighting potential vulnerabilities within the private credit sector.】

item.title: 特朗普官员称中国在人工智能领域仅落后美国 3-6 个月
item.description: 白宫人工智能和加密货币沙皇大卫-萨克斯（David Sacks）周二在华盛顿的一次活动上表示，中国在人工智能领域比美国落后三到六个月，并警告说美国过多的人工智能监管可能会损害美国在该行业的创新。【原文：China is three to six months behind the United States in artificial intelligence, White house AI and crypto czar David Sacks said Tuesday at an event in Washington, warning that excess U.S. AI regulation could damage American innovation in the industry.】

item.title: 白宫助理称美国能源贷款办公室应为石油和天然气提供资金
item.description: 白宫一位助理周二表示，美国能源部贷款办公室应为石油和天然气基础设施提供资金。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department's loan office should fund oil and gas infrastructure, a White House aide said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 行业高管称与美国政府的药品定价改革谈判缺乏清晰度
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）和默克公司（Merck）的高层管理人员周二在一次行业会议上表示，与特朗普政府就降低美国药品价格进行的谈判迄今尚未明确何时以及如何实施降价。【原文：Talks with the Trump administration about lowering U.S. drug prices have so far not provided clarity on when and how reduced prices will be implemented, top executives from Eli Lilly and Merck said at an industry conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：贝森特成为美联储鲍威尔继任者的可能竞争者
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）已成为接替美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的可能人选。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has emerged as a possible candidate to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官驳回谷歌隐私诉讼的集体诉讼请求
item.description: 美国一名法官裁定，那些指控谷歌非法收集其个人信息的人，在他们选择不将谷歌 Chrome 浏览器与谷歌账户同步后，不能以集体诉讼的形式起诉 Alphabet 部门。【原文：People who accused Google of illegally collecting their personal information, after they chose not to synchronize their Google Chrome browsers with their Google accounts, cannot sue the Alphabet unit as a group in a class action, a U.S. judge ruled.】

item.title: 壳牌高管表示，加拿大液化天然气项目第二阶段的决定将取决于其他机遇
item.description: 壳牌加拿大公司总裁斯塔西亚-韦斯特（Stastia West）周二在一次会议上表示，壳牌加拿大公司是否继续进行加拿大液化天然气项目第二阶段的建设，将取决于其他可利用的机会。【原文：Shell Canada's decision on whether to pursue Phase 2 of LNG Canada will depend on other opportunities that are available, President Stastia West said on Tuesday at a conference.】

item.title: 消息人士称，沃尔格林、Authentic Brands、Kourtney Kardashian 等公司正在评估 Rite Aid 资产
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，连锁药店沃尔格林（Walgreens）和真人秀明星出身的企业家库特妮-卡戴珊（Kourtney Kardashian）正在挑选 Rite Aid 破产案中的剩余资产。【原文：Pharmacy chain Walgreens and reality star turned entrepreneur Kourtney Kardashian are among those picking over the remaining assets in Rite Aid's bankruptcy, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Snap 将于 2026 年为用户推出智能眼镜，向 Meta 发起挑战
item.description: Snap 将于明年推出首款面向所有消费者的智能眼镜，从而加剧与更大竞争对手 Meta 在可穿戴技术市场的竞争。【原文：Snap will launch its first-ever smart glasses for all consumers next year, ratcheting up competition with bigger rival Meta in the wearable technology market.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 将斥资近 150 亿美元收购 Scale AI 股份
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引两位知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 已同意以 148 亿美元的价格收购人工智能初创公司 Scale AI 49% 的股份。【原文：Meta Platforms has agreed to take a 49% stake in artificial intelligence startup Scale AI for $14.8 billion, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管通胀反弹，墨西哥银行仍准备降息 50 个基点
item.description: 尽管近期通胀率飙升，但墨西哥央行预计本月将把关键利率再下调半个百分点，不过分析人士认为，如果物价继续得到控制，降息步伐可能会放缓。【原文：Mexico's central bank is expected to cut its key interest rate by another half percentage point this month despite a recent surge in inflation, although analysts believe the pace of rate cuts could slow if prices remain under control.】

item.title: 瑞士政府称，马斯克的 "星链 "计划在瑞士建立卫星链路
item.description: 瑞士通信管理局（BAKOM）周二表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的互联网服务公司 Starlink 已申请在瑞士西南部运营卫星连接。【原文：Elon Musk's internet service Starlink has made an application to operate a satellite connection in southwestern Switzerland, the Swiss office of communications (BAKOM) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，裕信银行提出出售 206 家分行，以获得欧盟对 Banco BPM 交易的批准
item.description: 三位直接了解此事的消息人士周二称，意大利联合信贷银行已提出剥离 206 家分行，试图获得欧盟反垄断批准，以收购竞争对手 Banco BPM。【原文：Italian bank UniCredit has offered to divest 206 branches in an attempt to secure EU antitrust approval to buy rival Banco BPM , three sources with direct knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利首席执行官 "超级振奋"，交易管道保持弹性
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席执行官泰德-皮克（Ted Pick）周二告诉投资者，在美国宣布4月份暂停征收关税后，他预计这家华尔街银行本季度末将表现强劲。【原文：Morgan Stanley CEO Ted Pick told investors on Tuesday he expected the Wall Street bank to have a strong end to the quarter after U.S. tariff announcements paused activity in April.】

item.title: 欧盟无条件批准 SES 出价 31 亿美元收购通信卫星组织
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，已无条件批准 SES 收购 Intelsat 的提议，这证实了路透社本月早些时候独家报道的消息。【原文：The European Commission said on Tuesday it had unconditionally approved the proposed acquisition of Intelsat by SES , confirming a story Reuters exclusively reported earlier this month.】

item.title: 先正达集团高管表示，预计 2025 年美国关税的影响微乎其微
item.description: 先正达作物保护业务全球总裁史蒂文-霍金斯（Steven Hawkins）周二表示，农用化学品公司先正达集团预计，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税对其2025年业务的影响微乎其微。【原文：Agrochemicals company Syngenta Group expects a minimal impact from tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump on its business in 2025, Steven Hawkins, global president of Syngenta's crop protection business, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Meta's Threads 将在部分市场测试直接信息功能
item.description: Meta Platforms 表示，它将开始在其 Threads 应用程序上推出直接消息功能，增加一项竞争对手早已提供的功能，以吸引更多用户。【原文：Meta Platforms said it would start rolling out direct messaging on its Threads app, adding a feature long offered by rivals, in a bid to attract more users.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度和美国在四天会谈后向达成临时贸易协定迈进
item.description: 印度政府消息人士称，印度和美国谈判代表周二在新德里就双边贸易协议举行的最新一轮会谈中取得了进展，重点讨论了工业品和部分农产品的市场准入、关税削减和非关税壁垒等问题。【原文：Indian and U.S. negotiators made progress in their latest round of talks in New Delhi on Tuesday on a bilateral trade deal, having focused on market access for industrial and some agricultural goods, tariff cuts and non-tariff barriers, Indian government sources said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯议员支持新的国家信息应用程序，以打击 WhatsApp 和 Telegram
item.description: 俄罗斯立法者周二投票赞成开发一款由国家支持的信息应用，该应用将与政府服务紧密结合，莫斯科正努力减少对 WhatsApp 和 Telegram 等平台的依赖。【原文：Russian lawmakers on Tuesday voted for the development of a state-backed messaging app that would be closely integrated with government services, as Moscow strives to reduce its dependency on platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram.】

item.title: 塔斯社报道：俄罗斯对违反 "LGBT宣传 "法的苹果公司处以罚款
item.description: 据俄罗斯塔斯社报道，俄罗斯一家法院周二对美国科技巨头苹果公司处以 600 万卢布（约合 76510 美元）的罚款，原因是苹果公司违反了俄罗斯关于莫斯科所谓 "LGBT 宣传 "的规定。【原文：A Russian court on Tuesday fined U.S. tech giant Apple six million roubles ($76,510) for violating Russian rules on what Moscow calls "LGBT propaganda," the state TASS news agency reported.】

item.title: 人工智能公司 Glean 在最新一轮融资中估值达 72 亿美元
item.description: 美国企业人工智能搜索初创公司 Glean 周二表示，该公司在资产管理公司惠灵顿管理公司（Wellington Management）领投的最新一轮融资中获得了 72 亿美元的估值。【原文：U.S. enterprise AI search startup Glean said on Tuesday it had notched a $7.2 billion valuation in its latest funding round, led by asset manager Wellington Management.】

item.title: 波音公司五月份获得 303 份新订单，并实现 737 MAX 的生产目标
item.description: 波音公司在巴黎航展之前的 5 月份取得了巨大成功，包括获得 303 架新订单和推出 38 架新型 737 MAX 喷气式飞机，这是波音公司一年多来一直在努力达到的生产速度。该公司周二表示，上个月还交付了 45 架飞机。【原文：Boeing is heading into the Paris Air Show after a blockbuster May that included booking 303 new orders and rolling out 38 new 737 MAX jets, a production rate that it has been working to reach for more than a year. The company also delivered 45 aircraft last month, it said Tuesday.】

item.title: NextEra 首席执行官称需要可再生能源作为扩大天然气发电的桥梁
item.description: NextEra 公司首席执行官约翰-凯彻姆（John Ketchum）周二表示，在增加天然气产能面临短期障碍的情况下，美国需要风能和太阳能等可再生能源来满足快速增长的能源需求。【原文：Renewable energy sources like wind and solar power are needed to meet rapidly growing energy demand in the United States amid near-term obstacles to increasing natural gas capacity, said NextEra CEO John Ketchum on Tuesday.】

item.title: 富国银行称今年消费贷款增长将保持低迷或下降
item.description: 富国银行首席财务官迈克-桑托马西莫（Mike Santomassimo）表示，今年下半年消费贷款的增长可能会持续低迷，并有可能出现下滑。【原文：Wells Fargo's Chief Financial Officer Mike Santomassimo said consumer loan growth is likely to remain muted for the rest of the year and could potentially slide.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 暂时搁置吉利德公司测试艾滋病毒药片组合的临床试验
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周二表示，吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）对其两种试验性艾滋病治疗药物组合进行的试验已被临床搁置。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has placed a clinical hold on Gilead Sciences' trials testing a combination of two of its experimental HIV treatments, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国机构追踪了 2022 年和 2023 年访问马斯克房产的外国人
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，美国政府机构跟踪了外国公民对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）公司的访问，因为人们担心可能有人试图影响这位科技界亿万富翁。【原文：U.S. government agencies tracked foreign nationals' visits to Elon Musk's proprieties amid concerns over possible attempts to influence the tech billionaire, The Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Blackstone 未来十年将在欧洲投资 5000 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone 首席执行官 Steve Schwarzman 周二在接受彭博电视采访时表示，Blackstone 计划未来十年在欧洲投资高达 5,000 亿美元，这彰显了市场对该地区前景的信心。【原文：Blackstone plans to invest up to $500 billion in Europe over the next decade, CEO Steve Schwarzman told Bloomberg Television in an interview on Tuesday, underscoring market confidence in the region's prospects.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，尽管人工智能领域存在竞争，OpenAI仍与谷歌达成了前所未有的云协议
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，OpenAI 计划增加 Alphabet 的谷歌云服务，以满足其对计算能力不断增长的需求，这标志着人工智能领域的两个主要竞争对手之间的合作令人惊讶。【原文：OpenAI plans to add Alphabet's Google cloud service to meet its growing needs for computing capacity, three sources told Reuters, marking a surprising collaboration between two prominent competitors in the artificial intelligence sector.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，世界银行下调全球经济增长预期
item.description: 世界银行周二将其对 2025 年全球经济增长的预测下调了 0.4 个百分点至 2.3%，称关税提高和不确定性加剧对几乎所有经济体都构成了 "重大不利因素"。【原文：The World Bank on Tuesday slashed its global growth forecast for 2025 by 0.4 percentage point to 2.3%, saying that higher tariffs and heightened uncertainty posed a "significant headwind" for nearly all economies.】
